a fantastic adventure jerry is an amazing character who is constantly trying his best in an otherwise tumultuous time will he be able to solve the mysteries of mousewood or succumb to the depths  the style of the game is reminiscent of earlier point and click adventures such as deponia or monkey island but with a more sophisticated art style overall its worth it at full price but definitely pick it up if its on discount

this is a good game similar to the deponia series  i enjoyed playing it with one exception the lame card game i spent way too much of my life playing just to get the last bugged achievement  but i succeeded and in the end i would recommend playing this
